name: unalike
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
People or things that are unalike are not similar to each other: The political views of the two women could hardly be more unalike. At first sight, the two cities are entirely unalike. Related word
alike
More examplesFewer examplesThere is a superficial resemblance between the girls, but in fact they are in most ways unalike.I deliberately chose to go to two places that were completely unalike.The boys were so unalike that I wondered how they could possibly be brothers.The two artists trained at the same school, but their works are altogether unalike.
